Camera.Flash:: Laser AF, color spectrum sensor, Dual-LED flash, panorama, HDR
Camera.Second camera:: 12 MP, f/2.4, 69mm (telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom

Design.Materials:: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, aluminum back
Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, compass
Design.Resistance:: IP65 dust tight and water resistant (low pressure water jets)

Battery.Charging::
100W wired, SCP, UFCS, PD, PPS, QC
5W reverse wired

Display.Features:: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, compass

Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, compass
Connectivity & Features.Location:: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC
Connectivity & Features.Bluetooth:: 6.0, A2DP, LE, L2HC (320-960 kbps HD audio)
